content.value:
Went out in my favourite sweary pandemic mask this morning and a lady told me off because her kids saw it.

Me: Do your kids know that word and what it means?
Her: YES!
Me: Well whose fault is that?

She did not appreciate.
content.html: Went out in my favourite sweary pandemic mask this morning and a lady told me off because her kids saw it. Me: Do your kids know that word and what it means? Her: YES! Me: Well whose fault is that? She did not appreciate.
